actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to encourage and assist in the distribution of the "Patient's Bill of Rights" to patients in hospitals and other health care facilities.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to encourage and assist in the distribution of the "Patient's Bill of Rights" to patients in hospitals and other health care facilities. Enumerates those rights referred to as the "Patient's Bill of Rights".

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to encourage and assist in the distribution of the "Patient's Bill of Rights" to patients in hospitals and other health care facilities.
